title: Alienware M15X fps drop
body:
Hi there,

my PC broke recently, so I took my cousin's older but still decent laptop "Alienware M15X"... in general, I cover the RECOMMENDED  system requirements like... double, but still can't play a game without having 40 fps which drops to 5 in a team fight. I don't understand... it should be blasting with 100+ fps, but nah... 35-40 in lane dropping to 20 if we trade and dropping to 2 - 5 fps in a full team fight.
Any thoughts or tips are greatly appreciated.
Thanks in advance
Alexander

P.S.
here is the DXDIAG info if needed
=========================

replies.body: Honestly, I think your cousin may just not have kept the PC tuned up.  Some driver updates for example should get this fixed up.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure the laptop is at its best and you should be good to go.  Hopefully, that will get you squared away!
